casebody.data:
No. 282,

Misc.

Patterson v. United States. John D. Cofer for petitioner. Solicitor General Perlman, Assistant Attorney General Mclnerney, Beatrice Rosenberg and Robert G. Maysack for the United States.

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion certiorari should be granted.
